definition: A chewable substance typically made from a combination of natural and synthetic materials, often flavored, that is commonly used for oral hygiene, freshening breath, and as a recreational activity. It is frequently found in small, individually wrapped pieces and is known for its elasticity and ability to be chewed for an extended period of time.

examples.german: Kaugummi ist eine z√§he Masse zum Kauen.
examples.english: Chewing gum is a chewy substance.

examples.german: Ich kaufe immer Kaugummi an der Kasse.
examples.english: I always buy chewing gum at the checkout.
Chewing gum can freshen your breath.

examples.german: Meine Schwester klebt ihren Kaugummi unter den Tisch.
examples.english: My sister sticks her chewing gum under the table.

examples.german: Kaugummi kann helfen, den Druck in den Ohren beim Fliegen auszugleichen.
examples.english: Chewing gum can help equalize the pressure in your ears when flying.
